string-array.name: technicaldescription
string-array.item:
COME PROGRAM AND SHOW YOUR SKILLS...
 This event is about to test your programing skills.
 You'll get few problems to solve through programs.

 TWO LEVEL TESTS...
 	 1.General Cyber Awareness
 	 2.Hard Time with Language


Fee->30/head

COME IF YOU DARE!

COME TO DESIGN YOUR DREAMS...


This event is to test your civil and designing skills.
 You'll be asked to design a bridge as per the requirements of the problem given to you.


Fee->Rs30/head

COME TO WIN YOUR DREAM!!

COME TO CHECK YOUR ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONICS KNOWLEDGE...


This event is conducted in two parts...
 1.General Quizz
 2.Circuit Designing


Fee->Rs30/head

GET AMAZED BY ELECTROLYSIS!!

string-array.name: nontechnicaldescription
string-array.item:
CHECK YOUR TRAJECTORY TARGET...


A 2 level event..
 1.Height event
 2.Target Hiting


Fee->Rs50/head(a team of two)

ENGLISH-WINGLISH


This one is to test your english spellings.

Fee->Free

ARE YOU A CINEMATOGRAPHER...GET CHECKED!!


This is movie event.
 You have to create a meaningful movie to win.


Fee->Free

string-array.name: sportsdescription
string-array.item:
A TRUE BATSMAN SHOULD IN MOST OF HIS STROKES TELL THE TRUTH ABOUT HIMSELF...


make a team AND chalenge others..


Fee->free(Team of 11 from same stream)

WINING ISN'T EVERYTHING...ITS' THE ONLY THING.


Get ready to drible the ball through 11........GOAL!!!


Fee->Free(team of 11 from same branch)

WE PUT THE bad IN badminton...


Pay hard to get off the riddles...
	NEED HARD STAMINA!!!


Fee->Free

WHEN YOU SEE A GOOD MOVE WAIT- LOOK FOR A BETTER ONE...


Get yourself drizzeled by others move....its not frevolus be careful!!


Fee->Free
